DefaultErrorFallback.primaryMessage.description: Error message on the default fallback displayed when something went wrong

DefaultErrorFallback.secondaryMessage.defaultMessage: If the error persists, try refreshing your browser and cleaning your browser's data.
DefaultErrorFallback.secondaryMessage.description: Message fn the default fallback inviting users to refresh their browser displayed when something went wrong

DefaultErrorFallback.retryButtonLabel.description: Label of the 'Try Again' button displayed on the default fallback when something went wrong

NetworkHandler.notification.offlineMessa.description: Message displayed in notification while offline

NetworkHandler.notification.onlineMessag.description: Message displayed in notification while back online

ServiceWorkerHandler.notification.update.description: Message displayed in notification when a new update is available

ServiceWorkerHandler.notification.refres.description: Label of the 'Refresh' button in the notification

ApplicationBar.marketSelectionMenuItemLa.description: Label of the menu item for the Market Selection view

ApplicationBar.settingsMenuItemLabel.description: Label of the menu item for the Settings view

App.modalDialog.closeButtonLabel.description: Label of the the 'Close' button in the main dialog

App.modalDialog.cancelButtonLabel.description: Label of the the 'Cancel' button in the main dialog

App.modalDialog.saveButtonLabel.description: Label of the the 'Save' button in the main dialog

App.modalDialog.marketSelectionTitle.description: Title of the Market Selection dialog

NextMarketEvent.defaultMessage: {status, select, OPEN {Open} CLOSE {Close} other {Next event}} in {relativeTime}

TimelineTime.backToRealtimeTooltip.defaultMessage: Click to come back to real-time
TimelineTime.backToRealtimeTooltip.description: Tooltip message on the button to come back to real time

TimelineTime.displayingRealtimeTooltip.description: Tooltip message on the time displaying in realtime

TimelinesContainer.ResyncFABLabel.description: Label of the button to resync real-time the timelines

TimelinesList.noMarketSelectedMessage.description: Message in the timeline list that stating no market has been selected

TimelinesList.goToMarketSelectionLinkMes.description: Message encouraging user to go select markets displayed as a link

MarketSelectionList.selectedMarketsListS.description: Subheader of the list containing the selected markets

MarketSelectionList.availableMarketsList.description: Subheader of the list containing the availabe (non-selected) markets

MarketSelectionList.noSelectedMarketMess.description: Message appearing in market selection when the list of selected is empty

MarketSelectionList.noAvailableMarketMes.description: Message appearing in market selection when the list of available is empty
